title: NASA Names University Teams to Take on Aeronautics Research Challenges
summary: NASA has selected four teams of university faculty and students to solve key challenges facing the future of air travel as part of the agency’s University Leadership Initiative.

title: NASA’s State Fact Sheets Highlight Economic Impact in All 50 States, DC
summary: As a follow-up to its biennial report demonstrating the economic impact of NASA nationwide, the agency released new state-specific information on Monday. Each of the 51 fact sheets, which are the first drafted by the agency, showcase how investments in NASA benefit humanity.

title: Astra Investigating Potential Illegal Short Selling As Delisting Deadline Approaches
summary: Astra Space (Nasdaq: ASTR) is investigating potential illegal short selling of the company's stock weeks as the April 4th delisting deadline approaches.

title: Meet the brothers building massive spacecraft to leverage SpaceX’s Starship
summary: A pair of brothers is aiming to challenge the way spacecraft are built, by going against the industry trend and designing massive satellites in a bet that towering rockets such as SpaceX’s Starship are the way forward.

title: Astra investigating ‘potential illegal short selling’ as delisting deadline looms
summary: Spacecraft engine manufacturer and small rocket builder Astra announced on Friday that the company is investigating “potential illegal short selling” among shareholders of its common stock.
